cleaned_text: The health and safety of our patients and staff are our top priority. Depending on Community Transmission Rates, we may limit the number of support people allowed at in-person visits to reduce the risk to our patients and staff. Vaccines are available to LifeLong patients only. All minors under the age of 18 will need parent/guardian consent to get vaccinated. Consent can be given in TWO ways: If you are a LifeLong patient and have tested positive for COVID-19, you may be eligible for treatment. Please call 510-981-4100 to talk to a health professional about COVID-19 treatment. Limited appointments are available at our William Jenkins Health Center (Richmond) And East Oakland Health Centers. All of LifeLong Medical Care's COVID-19 testing sites offer both drive-thru testing (for people in cars) and walk-up testing (for people without cars). COVID-19 testing is available to LifeLong patients only.
